div.p: I’m married and we have a little dog who’s our baby, she’s called Pickle, I love being out just walking a dog in the forest
you know that’s a great experience it’s nice just to be part of, you know, smelling the fresh air and just seeing the beauty that’s around us
and it’s through that has evolved me wanting to get more involved in looking after our earth and getting to know more in terms of
what we can do as individuals to make a difference.
